snippet: An estimated 260,000 people have fled to different regions of the country, and 814,000 have left the country to escape the fighting.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency says fighting in Ukraine has displaced more than a million people.
lead_paragraph: An estimated 260,000 people have fled to different regions of the country, and 814,000 have left the country to escape the fighting.

headline.main: More Than a Million Ukrainians Have Been Displaced, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Ukraine: A Million People Displaced, the U.N. Says
